PAPIER-MACHE COASTER SET SQUARE.

A beautifully done Paper-Mache coaster set box to suit your elegant tastes.These exquisite items have been hand painted by Kashmiri artists drawing inspiration from their beautiful legacy of art. Whether gifted to a loved one or treasured in your own home, this unique set of coasters deserve all the praise they receive.

Material:
    Paper pulp, Papier-Mache.
Care:
    Dust it with a soft cotton cloth to keep away the dirt.
Usage:
    Unique gift Item, Can be used to protect the surface of a table or any other surface where the user might place a drink.
Shipping Info:
    Dispatched in a maximum of 6 business days

PAPIER-MACHE JEWELLERY BOX OVAL SHAPE.
